description:
Brand New - April 2016!

Master the Art of Colouring Black and White Photographs - Add emotional value to your images with Toning techniques in Photoshop CC & speed up your workflow with Actions!


Master powerful Photoshop toning techniques, create stunning portfolio, amaze your clients with trendy & timeless vintage, subtly coloured black and white images! If you want to learn how to create toned digital black and white imagery that you can sell with great profit on image stocks like Shutterstock, Istock or Alamy - take this course!

This course is packed with high quality supporting materials (8 high resolution TIFF files) - they are downloadable and you can use them to speed up the learning process. The "hands-on" tutorial part of the course is based on the provided image base, you don't have to waste time on searching for suitable images. In case you don't have your own images I have prepared for you list of free online resources - with just a few clicks you can download amazing photographs!

I have provided as well 10 handcrafted Photoshop Actions - to help you manage big projects. With one button you can apply complex colourisation to multiple images.

In complete, explained step by step edits I will reveal secrets of my personal colorisation workflow.


Just join me in this course, download the supporting materials and immediately start  your fun & creative Photoshop adventure!


  • You will learn whole range of the most powerful and flexible digital toning techniques;
  • You will be working in "non-destructive" way with Adjustment Layers to massively speed up the editing work;
  • You will master the most effective and flexible Photoshop tool in terms of photo editing - The Curves Tool;
  • You will achieve stunning results with your images and develop your artistic skills;


So say "goodbye" to flat, washed-out photos and learn how in no time achieve dramatic results and amaze your friends, family and clients.

Start enjoying your work with the most effective and powerful Photoshop techniques now!
title: Master the Art of Colouring Black and White Photographs
